description:
Non Material Minor Amendment  of planning permission reference P112406 dated 30/3/2012 for the Section 73 application to vary the wording of condition 2 of planning permission reference P091813 for the Demolition of 465 (excluding east elevation/facade) and 465A Caledonian Road and the erection of a part six storey, part eight storey and part 11 storey building, plus basement for student accommodation, comprising 350 bed spaces, common room and administrative facilities, office accommodation (Class B1[a] 589 sq.m) and ground floor commercial uses (Class A1/A3/A5 [671 sq.m] ), together with outdoor amenity space and landscaping.  The amendments are:
Restraint ties to Caledonian Road elevation, widened window opening to Caledonian Road behind retained facade, addition of ventilation grilles and repositioned window openings  to internal courtyard elevations and west elevation and other minor alterations to elevations. .  Removal of cycle store lift, relocation of laundry room and alterations to landscaping layout including enclosure of rear of retail unit.
